zh.title: N7綫推行雙向分段收費
zh.content: 絲巴自2025年12月10日起，於N7綫新增雙向分段收費，讓深宵往返市中心、卡城與維拉的乘客享有更靈活的選擇。詳情請前往巴士路綫頁面並選擇相關路綫，或按此。

zh.title: 17、17A綫調整班次
zh.content: 絲巴自2026年1月3日起，調整17及17A綫往市中心方向的班次，早上5時半至下午5時之間由20分鐘一班調整為30分鐘一班，詳情請參閱巴士路綫頁面並選擇相關路綫。

en.title: N7 Implements Two-way Sectional Fare
en.content: From 10 December 2025, StarTone Transport implements two-way sectional fares on route N7, providing more flexible fare options for passengers travelling between Downtown, Katadelpia and Vayler at overnight. Refer to Bus Route page and select the relevant route for details, or click here.

en.title: Route 17 and 17A Frequency Adjustment
en.content: From 3 January 2026, StarTone Transport will adjust the frequency of route 17 and 17A towards Downtown from every 20 minutes to every 30 minutes between 5:30 AM and 5:00 PM. Refer to Bus Route page and select the relevant route for details.
